      Photo
      The Nexus Looks Back: This Year in Photos
      June 6, 2013 by Daily Nexus Photography


      By Jonathon Cuong

      A diaper-clad reveler chats with law enforcement on Halloween weekend. This year’s Halloween festivities resulted in 196 jail bookings and 249 citations.

       

      By Benjamin Pu

      Incumbent Lois Capps (D.) and former Lieutenant Governor Abel Maldonado (R.) squared off in UCSB’s Pollock Theater in a debate for the 24th District Congressional seat.

       

      Photo by Kenneth Song

      UCSB senior defender Peter McGlynn was arrested after he pushed down a referee at the conclusion of the UCSB men’s soccer game against UC Davis in October.

       


      Photo by Magali Gauthier

      Thousands of UCSB students aimed for viral fame with the campus’s own version of the Harlem Shake internet meme.

       

      Photo by Alex Gonzales

      The 2nd annual Gauchella festival brought together a range of campus performing arts groups. .

       

      Photo by Audrey Bachelder

      “If you’re going to make movies for yourself, you better love your shit. You better get off 24/7 to your own movies … and that’s what I do.”
      -Quentin Tarantino, during an appearance at the Santa Barbara International Film Festival in February.

       

      Photo by Peter Vandenbelt

      The 22nd annual Reel Loud Film Festival showcased students’ seven-minute-or-less silent film projects in May. “The Film & Media department’s annual exhibition of student shorts is easily the most anticipated and unique local event for film-lovers.”-Artsweek‘s Corie Anderson.

       

      Photo by Peter Vandenbelt

      Best Coast performing in the Hub.

       

      Photo by Kenneth Song

      UCSB Battle of the Bands Winner Alpha Phunk

       

      Photo courtesy of Robert Clayton

      The balcony of a Del Playa house collapsed during a Deltopia day party with at least four reported as seriously injured. Lawsuits ensued.

       

      Photo by Kenneth Song

      Deltopia 2013 attracted an estimated 15,000-18,000 partygoers–more than any past year.

       

      Photo courtesy of Ailea Richter

      A backflip off a mail truck during Deltopia 2013.

       
      Photo by John Clow

      Hundreds of students attended A.S. Senate meetings to voice their opinions on a proposed resolution to divest from companies that “profit from the military occupation of Palestine.”

       

      Photo courtesy of Sally Oh

      Students gather to protest the A.S. Senate’s decision to strike the revised divestment resolution from the agenda.

       

      Photo by Mark Brocher

      A.S.elections yielded an OPP sweep of all five Executive Board positions and all Senate positions except one.

       

      Photo by Mark Brocher

      The Daily Nexus was reaffirmed.

       

      Photo by Peter Vandenbelt

      Headliner Radical Something performing at Chilla Vista 2013.

       

      Photo by Mark Brocher

      Seth Rogen, Craig Robinson and Danny McBride made a brief appearance at UCSB to promote an advanced screening of their movie This Is The End.

       

      Photo by Peter Vandenbelt

      Kendrick Lamar at Extravaganza 2013.

       


      Photo by Peter Vandenbelt

      Dada Life gets intimate.

      A cool team of photographers who preserves the visual memory of UCSB and Isla Vista.

          The Signs as Summer Desserts


          • Aries
            March 21 - April 19
            Yerba mate chocolate truffles
          • Taurus
            April 20 - May 20
            triple chocolate cake
          • Gemini
            May 21 - June 20
            Fireball pumpkin pie
          • Cancer
            June 21 - July 22
            Bucket of ice water
          • Leo
            July 23 - August 22
            S'mores
          • Virgo
            August 23 - September 22
            Vodka mocha bundt cake
          • Libra
            September 23 - October 22
            Chocolate-covered almonds
          • Scorpio
            October 23 - November 21
            Frozen yogurt with Hot Cheeto topping
          • Sagittarius
            November 22 - December 21
            Jar of mayonnaise
          • Capricorn
            December 22 - January 19
            Rum cake
          • Aquarius
            January 20 - February 18
            Oatmeal raisin cookies
          • Pisces
            February 19 - March 20
            Raspberry cheesecake
